title: PHPrmdir()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPrmdir()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Remove "images" directory:
<?php
$path = "images";
if(!rmdir($path)) {
echo ("Could not remove $path");
}
?>
Definition and Usage
The rmdir() function removes an empty directory.
Syntax
rmdir(
dir
,
context
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
dir
Required. Specifies the path to the directory to be removed
context
Optional. Specifies the context of the file handle. Context is a set of options that can modify the behavior of a stream
Technical Details
Return Value:
TRUE on success, FALSE on failure
PHP Version:
4.0+

★
+1
